titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: <*> "1 m 1 v" line = notation after "20"? <*> "Harmonium" line = blotted out mark s3: <*> 6 Dec = "pneu"?

body.ab:
1933 GASCOYNE Oct 9 David Gascoyne Hotel Jacob 44 rue Jacob Hotel de l'Odéon
1 m 1 v 20<*> 22 50 ref. dep 50
Oct 9 Transition bound v No 1 Oct 11 " " no 15 Oct 12 (Red Front (owes for copy) Oct 12 Geography & Plays Oct 14 ask him if he saw new copy of Geog. & Plays 14 Devil in the Flesh Oct 17 against the grain bought owes 12v 17 European Caravan Oct 20 20 transition no 13 Oct 21 " no 14 " " no 12 25 23 - Year before Last - ask him if he Oct 28 Eimi * brought back 26 26 Bridge --- * Oct 30 28 Autobiography of Toklas Oct 30 30 Flush Oct 31 31 Geography & Plays 2 Nov. Winner take Nothing 2 Nov. 2 Nov. Anarchism is not enough Nov 4 Honeycomb (extra) 6 Nov. 4 Nov Thomas the Imposter 6 Nov 6 Nov Transition 5-8 bound Nov 8 Harmonium (extra) <*>
GASCOYNE 8 Nov. Tunnel extra 13 Nov. 8 " 4 Brooms Nos Sept-Oct Nov-Dec 10 Nov 13 " Visit of the Gipsies 17 " renewed 9 Nov. to 9 December 22 50 14 Nov. Transition 11 (uncut) extra Nov 14 17 Use of Poetry 17 " 18. These 13 refunded 11v Nov 20 20 Nov
1933 GASCOYNE
the Red Front 4 Nov pd 14- Nov 2 Surrealism 3.50 3.50 paid 7 - 10 Alanna Autumnal paid 20.50 6 Dec. cheque New Verse £1 6 " " returned in <*> to Gascoyne 21 letter to P. Press no answer 18 Jan registered letter c/o Codden S. 23 " letter from Gascoyne owes one pound
